scripts.test: npm run compile && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test ./test-suites/test-palmy/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-scenarios: npm run compile && TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test test-suites/test-palmy/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-palmy/scenario.spec.ts
scripts.test-subgraph:scenarios: npm run compile && hardhat test test-suites/test-palmy/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-palmy/subgraph-scenarios.spec.ts
scripts.test:main:check-list: npm run compile && FORK=main TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=1 hardhat test  test-suites/test-palmy/__setup.spec.ts test-suites/test-palmy/oasys/check-list.spec.ts
scripts.palmy:testnet:dev:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- palmy:dev
scripts.palmy:oasys:dev:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- palmy:dev
scripts.palmy:docker:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- palmy:oasys --skip-registry
scripts.palmy:docker:full:migration:add-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- palmy:oasys
scripts.palmy:docker:add-market-to-registry-from: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Palmy
scripts.palmy:testnet:add-market-to-registry-fro: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- add-market-to-registry --pool Palmy
scripts.palmy:oasys:add-market-to-registry-from-: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- add-market-to-registry --pool Palmy
scripts.palmy:docker:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:docker -- add-market-to-registry --pool Palmy --deploy-registry
scripts.palmy:testnet:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- add-market-to-registry --pool Palmy --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.palmy:oasys:add-market-to-new-registry: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- add-market-to-registry --pool Palmy --verify --deploy-registry
scripts.palmy:fork:main: npm run compile && FORK=main hardhat palmy:oasys
scripts.palmy:testnet:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:testnet -- palmy:oasys
scripts.palmy:oasys:full:migration: npm run compile && npm run hardhat:oasys -- palmy:oasys
scripts.palmy:main:full:initialize: npm run compile && FORK=main full:initialize-tokens --pool Palmy
scripts.ci:test: npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.external:deploy-assets-testnet: npm run compile && hardhat --network testnet external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
scripts.external:deploy-assets-oasys: npm run compile && hardhat --network oasys external:deploy-new-asset --symbol ${SYMBOL} --verify
